sentence: In early trading on Wednesday, shares of Tiffany & Co. ( TIF ) topped the list of the day's best performing components of the S&P 500 index, trading up 9.3%.
Year to date, Tiffany & Co. registers a 3.9% gain.
And the worst performing S&P 500 component thus far on the day is PetSmart ( PETM ), trading down 4.8%.
PetSmart is lower by about 18.7% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Salesforce.com Inc ( CRM ), trading down 2.8%, and American International Group ( AIG ), trading up 2.5% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
